DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy single dose intravenous ibuprofen compare single dose ketorolac treatment postoperative pain measure patient pain intensity ( Visual Analog Scale , VAS ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Comparing Analgesic Efficacy IV Ibuprofen IV Ketorolac
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study compare efficacy single dose intravenous ibuprofen compare single dose ketorolac treatment postoperative pain measure patient pain intensity ( Visual Analog Scale , VAS ) . The secondary objective study : - To compare amount time rescue medication postoperative period IV ibuprofen IV ketorolac treatment group . - To compare time mobility postoperative period IV ibuprofen IV ketorolac treatment group . - To compare time discharge postoperative period IV ibuprofen IV ketorolac treatment group . - To compare incidence adverse event IV ibuprofen IV ketorolac treatment group .
DOC.criteria: Patients preoperative diagnosis inclusive chronic pelvic pain schedule Laparoscopic Surgery Inadequate IV access . History allergy hypersensitivity component IVIb , ketorolac , aspirin ( aspirin relate product ) , NSAIDs , COX2 inhibitor . Less 18 year age Greater 65 year age . Use analgesic , include NSAIDs , less 12 hour prior surgery . Patients active , clinically significant anemia . History evidence asthma heart failure . Pregnant . Inability understand requirement study , willing provide write informed consent ( evidenced signature inform consent document approve Institutional Review Board [ IRB ] ) , agree abide study restriction return required assessment . Refusal provide write authorization use disclosure protect health information . Patients history Chronic Pain Conditions Syndromes exclude patient Chronic Pelvic Pain . Patients know OSA
